fields.title: Services

fields.title: Recruitment and Selection
fields.content:
Recruiting the right people is the key to the success of many organizations. These organizations ensure that the processes and procedures involved in recruitment and selection meet their needs and are legal. In this unit, Potential applicants may decide to apply for a post based on the quality of information that they receive. Details of the post will usually be the first communication they have with the organization. It is important that the organization makes a good first impression on potential applicants to ensure that they attract sufficient applicants of the right ability.

Recruitment and Selection is an important operation in HRM, designed to maximize employee strength to meet the employer's strategic goals and objectives. In short, Recruitment and Selection is the process of sourcing, screening, shortlisting and selecting the right candidates for the filling the required vacant positions.

Among the various services offered, Recruitment and Selection Service of Real Solutions is one of the major and popular services preferred by Banks, Hydropower Projects, Corporate houses, Development Organizations and Multinational Companies since its inception.

The main objective of this unit is to meet client’s requirement by recruiting and selecting quality applicants.

fields.title: Staff Outsourcing
fields.content:
Outsourcing the staff needs enables you to match your workforce to your workload and eliminate the financial burden of carrying in your employment, extra full-time staff when not required. Real Solutions’ staff outsourcing solution helps you to gain a flexible and productive staffing solution whilst simultaneously controlling cost. Our dedicated and highly experienced expertise provides you with immediate assistance and guidance and down times become a thing of the past and best of all, you no longer have staff administrative or legislative burdens.
Other benefits associated with staff outsourcing contracts are competitive pricing structures, continuity of supply, predetermined service levels and dedicated contract supervision.
This function covers the following areas among:
•	Front and Back office support
•	IT support
•	Customer Care and other Clerical support services
This is a client specific service tailored to the unique individual needs of each client based on the industry, staff requirements, operating conditions and other determining factors. In summary however, we follow the following simple steps:
•	Obtain an expression of interest
•	Discuss the requirements and agree on terms
•	Draw and sign the contract
•	Recruit and place staff
•	Engage in continuous monitoring and evaluation
fields.excerpt: Be more strategic in your business operations with wide array of outsource service!

fields.title: HR Consulting
fields.content:
Real Solutions’ Human Resource Consulting Services (HRCS) performs a very crucial and intensive role in fulfilling the HR-related requirements and challenges of various organizations nationwide helping them eliminate inefficiency, increase productivity and achieving goals.
Our years of experience as a human resource consulting services provider allows us to comprehensively address human resource related provisions and challenges in an organization. We highly take care of clients’ HR related concerns and necessities, access what they truly need and how we can assist them. We work alongside our clients to analyze their organizational requirements and then offer highly configured solutions to fulfill their needs in a very proficient and professional way. Our innovative approach to operate, manage and delivering qualitative outcomes enables us to ensure that our clients receive exceptional value from their project initiatives and help them gain maximum return on their investment.
fields.excerpt: Our services, your sustainable success! We just don’t meet demands, we accomplish results that exceed them!

fields.title: Corporate Training
fields.content:
We understand, analyze and fulfill client’s learning requirements by developing and facilitating quality training and development programs (training, workshop, coaching, counseling and seminar) accordingly. 

Real Solutions has been providing various technical, behavioral, and development training to employees of diverse organizations including its pre-during-post support. Our Training and Development involves refining existing skills and developing new ones, in fact, gaining more knowledge, clarifying concepts, sharpening skills, and changing attitude of trainees (employees) to enhance their job performance. In those programs, we equipped participants to unlock their hidden potential within them and support organizations to fulfill their performance goal.

fields.about_content:
Real Solutions Private Limited, an ISO: 9001:2015 certified company, is an independent consulting firm that specializes in providing a complete or sectional Human Resource Management support to the National and International Organizations in Nepal.
Acknowledged as a leading and innovating Human Resource Management Consultancy in Nepal, we believe in providing Real HR Solutions & services to our clients. Throughout the years of operation, Real Solutions has proved its management competency by assisting the organizations in addressing their key human capital issues and providing objective solutions.
With a mission to support organizations strategically and manage human capital to achieve business excellence, Real Solutions employs a pragmatic, pro-active and service delivery literate team of professionals. We therefore are, able to bring to bear an appropriate blend of skills and knowledge to meet our clients’ specific needs.

We aim to provide practical, integrated and robust solutions for HR department in various organizations throughout the country adding significant value to their operations and reassuring positive impact.

We, at Real Solutions relish in taking up the challenges of our clients helping them build and maintain their HR and benefits structure. Since inception, we have been providing Real Management Solutions to various national and international organizations tailored to their needs addressing their key human capital issues and providing objective solutions giving them the freedom to focus on their core business and their life.

• ISO 9001:2015 Certified Human Resource Consulting in Nepal.
  • 15 years and plus experience in Human Capital Management.
  • More than 100 national and international satisfied clients
  • Passionate and dedicated team of HR intellectuals.
  • Customized solutions for your HR needs.

fields.sidebar_content: "To be Leading International Human Resource Solutions Provider."

fields.title: Conduct Customized Training
fields.content: As per the requirement of the particular organization, Real Solutions facilitate customized training/workshop program with close collaboration with our team of expert and concerned authority of respective organization

fields.title: Conduct General Training
fields.content: Real Solutions also launch and facilitate general training where employees from various organizations get opportunity to learn and share their knowledge and skills on general topics such as personality development, Human Resource Practices, Report writing, MS Excel, Public Speaking, and so on.

fields.title: Training Need Assessment
fields.content: Before designing and offering any training/workshop for employees, Real Solutions conduct Training Need Analysis to decide what specific knowledge, skills, and attitudes are needed to improve the employee’s performance thorough various tools such as survey, interview with supervisor, group discussion, data of employee’s performance, online test.

fields.title: Training Content Development
fields.content: Training module and Content Development is also valuable service of Real Solutions where we develop the content of training as per results obtained from Training Need Assessment, expected outcomes, competency level of employees, client’s vision on employee’s development.

fields.title: Facilitate Training sessions
fields.content: Under this service, Real Solutions facilitates the training session run by other organization. This includes the logistics management including venue, food, training materials.

fields.title: Post Training evaluation
fields.content: After delivering training, it is important to assess whether the training objectives were achieved. For this, we conduct Post Training Evaluation to organization based on the previously set criteria to evaluate knowledge transfer, behavioral change, and performance enhancement.

fields.title: Counseling
fields.content: Counseling is a personalized service where counselor offer his expertise to the participant who has limited knowledge and experience on career choices, job market industry, and job searching techniques.

fields.title: Coaching
fields.content: Coaching is senior level employees focused package with an objective to provide them unbiased and individualized career guide, visionary exercise, values realization through series of meeting with coach.

fields.title: Leadership Development program
fields.content: Leadership Development Program is provided for enhancing leadership skill of individual employees through self-involvement in conceptualizing, budgeting, and implementing program which should create learning environment in an organization.

fields.title: Human Resource Management Services: Setup Functions
fields.content: HRMS most practical and sensible HR setup functions required to the clients that aims in streamlining, optimizing and systematizing best human resource practices in their organization. The component of services includes Job Analysis, Job description, Job specification, Organizational structure, Human resource policies and procedures, Forms and formats, Employee performance management system and so on including other comprehensive services as needed by organization.

fields.title: Human Resource Management Software: RealHRSoft
fields.content: RealHRsoft is Human Resource Intelligence System that incorporates various functions and aspects of Human Resource Management through a single system. It comprises information system where the HR related data and information of an organization are integrated together to simplify and optimize the HR management functions. Various HR modules are incorporated which includes Human resource information system, Leave and Attendance, Employee communication, Task management, Notification and Alerts, Employee payroll & benefits management, HR analytical reports, Organizational structure, Policies and many more. RealHRsoft not only simplifies but empowers human resource department and personnel through its integrated functions via system.

fields.title: Program and Project Management
fields.content: With more than a decade of experiences, we aim to incorporate our capabilities and innovative approach to provide project management services of highest professional standards to organization and industries of all kind. Our team of qualified project managers works collaboratively with the client project team to deliver the best. Our partnership on such initiatives includes fulfilling the overall requirement of Human resource provision from Orientation, Deployment, Training, Workshop, Payment Management and Logistic arrangement, Monitoring and Evaluation, Work Progress Mapping, Coordination, Reporting to Completion.

fields.title: Recruitment
fields.content:
Recruitment can be defined as searching for and obtaining a pool of potential candidates with the desired knowledge, skills and experience to allow an organization to select the most appropriate people to fill job vacancies against defined position descriptions and specifications.

The purpose of the recruitment process is to find the widest pool of applicants to provide the greatest opportunity to select the best people for the required roles in an organization.

Acquiring the best applicants for a role can be a competitive advantage for an organization whereas ineffective recruitment and selection can result in massive disruption, reduced productivity, interpersonal difficulties and interruptions to operations, customer service and long more.

fields.title: Selection
fields.content:
Once a pool of candidates has been identified through the recruitment process the most appropriate candidate, or candidates are identified through a selection process including but not limited to interviewing, reference checking and testing.  The purpose of the selection process is to ensure that the best person or people are appointed to the role or roles using effective, fair and equitable assessment activities.
In Short, HR Company most have these two basic services, through which they have to hold overall system or packages for the betterment and development of organization.

fields.title: 1. Job Title: Teller/ CSD (Job Grade — Junior Assistant Trainee: Few)
fields.content:
Minimum Requirement:
> Minimum + 2 or equivalent Degree with minimum 2nd division, However preference shall be given to Bachelor degree holder.
> Age not exceeding 25 years in case of male and 30 years in case of female as of 28, as of 22"d March,2018.
> Excellent interpersonal skills, strong verbal and written communication skills in both Nepali and English,
> Computer literate of Office Applications.

fields.title: Job Title: Relationship Officer /Operation Incharge (Job Grade —Supervisor: 12 & Assistant: 16)
fields.content:
Minimum Requirement:
> Minimum Bachelor's Degree in management or equivalent Degree from recognized University with minimum 2nd division,
> Minimum 2 years working experience in the relevant area of Banks and Financial Institutions,
> Age not exceeding 25 years in case of male and 30 years in case of female, as of 22nd  March, 2018.
> Strong verbal and written communication skills in both Nepali and English,
> Computer literate of Office Applications.

fields.title: Job Title: Officer Recruitment & Training HR (Job Grade —Jr.Officer to Officer:2)

> Minimum 5 years working experience in relevant area of Banks and Financial Institutions in HR Department with focus on capacity building.
> Age not exceeding 35 years in case of male and 40 years in case of female, as of 22nd March,2018.
> Computer literate of Office Applications
> Strong verbal and written communication skills in both Nepali and English.

fields.title: Unique Working Culture
fields.title_content:
We believe that productivity is a result of work mixed with the love for the work. At merojob, we focus on creating a healthy and fun working environment. We provide a platform where individuals can work to excel their talents and accomplish their tasks in an efficient manner.

Apart from daily work, we also introduce different activities, events and employee engagement programs to relieve the employees from various work related stress. These activities refresh the employees and make them livelier and also create a bond between the company and its employees. Leadership Development Programs (LDP) at merojob allow employees to grow as a leader in creative manner.
fields.detail_content:
We believe that productivity is a result of work mixed with the love for the work. At merojob, we focus on creating a healthy and fun working environment. We provide a platform where individuals can work to excel their talents and accomplish their tasks in an efficient manner.

Apart from daily work, we also introduce different activities, events and employee engagement programs to relieve the employees from various work related stress. These activities refresh the employees and make them livelier and also create a bond between the company and its employees. Leadership Development Programs (LDP) at merojob allow employees to grow as a leader in creative manner.

fields.title: Benefit Packages
fields.title_content:
We, at merojob, treasure our employees and value their contribution in the achievement of overall company objectives. We believe that employee recognition is the key to satisfied and well-motivated employees.

Similarly, future security of our employees is also one of our major concerns. To create a sense of security among the employees, we have developed & implemented various compensation & benefit packages for our employees. Some of the packages include Employee Provident Fund (EPF), Citizen Investment Trusts (CIT), Insurances, Gratuity Funds, Medical Plan and Maternity Leaves.

In addition, fuel allowance, communication allowance, festival allowance and so on are also provided for the convenience & well-being of the employees.

fields.title: Corporate Ambience
fields.title_content:
With an aim to provide the best working environment, we provide spacious and cozy work stations to the employees. Each work station is equipped with the required tools and equipment. The employees work in the office which they have designed & renovated on their own in collaboration with the management.

We carry out our tasks with the most updated technological tools in order to make our output better.The subordinates work in close supervision of their departments head. Through this, they are constantly guided and supported by their immediate supervisors. Along with pleasant work environment, we also provide healthy & nutritious lunch menu through a subsidized meal plan. The employees enjoy their lunch at the roof-top cafeteria with a pleasing view.

fields.title: Rewards and Recognition
fields.title_content:
Each employee contributes to the strengthening and progress of the organization and deserves to be rewarded for his/her hard work. We observe our employees in every stage of their progress and lend our hands whenever they are in need. We reward the employees by including them in the profit distribution of the company.

Every employee is entitled to attractive incentives as soon as he/she becomes a part of the family. Similarly, we also have the system of grading our employees and endowing them with attractive perk. By reviewing their work and progress, we grant special rewards to encourage them further. Increment is provided every year on the basis of their performances.

fields.title: Safety First
fields.title_content:
Safe and healthy working environment is very important for every individual in an organization. Better healthy and safety of the employees is one of our major concerns. We try our best to minimize the risk of accidents, health crisis or any factors that directly or indirectly affect the health of our employees. To minimize the risks and deal with crisis situations, we have formed a “Health & Safety Team” in the organization. The Health & Safety Team is primarily responsible for coordinating the health & safety arrangements and emergency situations within the organization.

The team will act as the focal point for receiving and disseminating health and safety information. Health and Safety Team is also responsible for formulating & implementing the policies which defines different provision such as emergency responses, accidental insurance, medical insurance, leave facilities and the roles of responsible groups during the situation. We provide essential safety related trainings to develop a sense of security among the employees to cope with emergency

fields.title: CSR Activities
fields.title_content:
merojob is also actively involved in various Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) activities. The company initiates and actively participates in various programs for the well-being of the society and the nation as a whole. One of the most recent CSR activities was “Free Volunteer Recruitment Service”. The program was carried out in response to the devastating earthquake that struck Nepal on April 25, 2015.

As an initiative to support various earthquake relief programs in the nation, the company came up with the project “merojob Earthquake Relief Support”. The main focus of this program was to provide volunteers to the companies providing earthquake relief and support programs in various earthquake affected areas. Through collaboration with various companies working towards earthquake relief campaigns and utilization of its core competencies, the team was able to fulfill the need of human resource in various affected areas deploying more than 3500 volunteers.

fields.title: Facebook acknowledges it shared user data with dozens of companies
fields.body:
Facebook has admitted providing dozens of tech companies with special access to user data after publicly saying it restricted such access in 2015.

Facebook continued sharing information with 61 hardware and software makers after it said it discontinued the practice in May 2015, the social networking giant acknowledged in 747 pages of documents delivered to Congress late Friday. The documents were in response to hundreds of questions posed to Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg by members of Congress in April.

Facebook said it granted a special "one-time" six-month extension to companies that ranged from AOL to package-delivery service United Parcel Service to dating app Hinge so they could come into compliance with the social network's new privacy policy and create their own versions of Facebook for their devices. Data shared without users' knowledge included friends' names, genders and birth dates.

"We engaged companies to build integrations for a variety of devices, operating systems and other products where we and our partners wanted to offer people a way to receive Facebook or Facebook experiences," the company said in the documents. "These integrations were built by our partners, for our users, but approved by Facebook."

Facebook's documents also said it had discovered that five other companies "theoretically could have accessed limited friends' data" as a result of a beta test.

Facebook said in the documents it has ended 38 of the partnerships and plans to discontinue seven more by the end of July.
Watch this: Can tech protect the midterm elections from Russian interference?
1:04

The disclosure was part of Facebook's second attempt to address questions posed to Zuckerberg in April by members of the House Energy and Commerce Committee. In June, the social network released its written responses to some of the committee's questions, many of which Zuckerberg responded to during that hearing by saying he'd have his team "get back to" lawmakers with answers.

Zuckerberg's testimony before both the Senate and House in April came as the social network deal with a scandal involving Cambridge Analytica, a digital consultancy that had ties to the Trump presidential campaign. Cambridge Analytica improperly accessed personal information on up to 87 million Facebook users, prompting a backlash that raised questions about whether Facebook can be trusted to protect the personal information of its 2 billion users.

The company has also been in the hot seat for not doing enough to prevent abuse from Russian trolls that posted misinformation and divisive content on the platform. The Russian activity was part of a program to meddle in the US presidential election and sow discord among voters.

Lawmakers in particular raised concerns over Facebook giving Huawei special access to user data, particularly with Huawei, a company perennially in the crosshairs of the US government for security reasons.

The controversy erupted in June when the New York Times reported that Facebook had agreements to provide access to large amounts of user data to at least 60 different device makers -- including companies like Apple, Microsoft, Samsung and BlackBerry.

In a test, a New York Times reporter logged into Facebook using a 2013 BlackBerry device, using an account with roughly 550 friends, monitoring the data requested and received. Through a BlackBerry app called The Hub, the device was able to acquire "identifying information" for up to 295,000 Facebook users.

Facebook didn't immediately respond to a request for comment but has previously said it's taking actions to make sure the Cambridge Analytica data exploit doesn't happen again. Zuckerberg said Facebook will investigate all apps that have access to large amounts of data, and restrict developers' data access even further.
fields.excerpt: The social network had agreements with 61 companies, ranging from AOL to UPS to dating app Hinge.

fields.title: Malicious Cryptocurrency Mining on the Rise
fields.body:
Cryptojacking has been repeatedly cited as a growing cause of concern in the cybersecurity space, something often attributed to the latent reward tied to this form of cyber attacks.

Widespread cases like the recent Drupalgeddon 2  – an attack on sites running the Drupal content management system – and the 8,500 percent increase in cryptojacking noted in 2017 have differentiated it as a major area of focus for people and entities managing cybersecurity risks.

All internet users have to take some form of preventive measures, including devotees of the Linux operating system which has a firmer reputation than operating systems like Windows when it comes to cybersecurity.

WatchGuard recommends that everyone consider installing an anti-mining browser extension like No Coin, just to be safe.
